title: Top Five Action Movie Scenes and the Madness of Michael Bay’s ‘Ambulance’
description:
Michael Bay is back on the big screen with 'Ambulance,' a thrilling, nonstop cornucopia of explosions, car chases, shoot-outs, bank robberies, and emergency bullet-removal surgeries. Sean is joined by Chris Ryan to talk about Bay (1:00) and our favorite action movie sequences of all time (38:30).

Host: Sean Fennessey
Guest: Chris Ryan
Producer: Bobby Wagner
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
